MemberSignature.Value: public void ResolveSiteArgument (string siteArgument, out string siteName, out string siteID);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveSiteArgument(string siteArgument, [out] string& siteName, [out] string& siteID) cil managed
Public Sub ResolveSiteArgument (siteArgument As String, ByRef siteName As String, ByRef siteID As String)
public: virtual void ResolveSiteArgument(System::String ^ siteArgument, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % siteName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % siteID);
abstract member ResolveSiteArgument : string * * -> unit override this.ResolveSiteArgument : string * * -> unit

param.name: siteArgument
param.span: 網站名稱或網站識別項。

span.span: The site name or site identifier.
The default site name.
A unique identifier for the site.

summary.span: 根據網站引數值，填入網站名稱和網站識別碼。

span.span: Populates the site name and site ID based on a site argument value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`siteArgument`已`null`，或等於預設的網站名稱，或等於預設站台識別項`siteName`和`siteID`值會填入預設站台值。If `siteArgument` is `null`, or is equal to the default site name, or is equal to the default site identifier, the `siteName` and `siteID` values are populated with the default site values.
